channel.title: Silicone Mold on SZ Planet
channel.description: Recent content in Silicone Mold on SZ Planet

item.title: Piggy Emoji Mold
item.description: Step 1: Prepare CAD Model I used SOLIDWORKS to create a piggy sketch. Rather than a simple 3D printed part, I added a cylinder shaped pouring cup to make sure that I can pour liquids in the mold later. Additionally, I added a small riser for air to escape after liquids are pour in. To make a clean cast, I introduced some draft to the part as well to reduce sharp edges so that the parts can come off easily.
